channel.title: laundry on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in laundry on Barefoot Rob

item.title: laundry work
item.description: 7 october 1999 Today it was decidedly cold when I woke up! I’ve been sleepin’ with only a sheet for the past some weeks, and my bedroom window is open so Spot can get in and out via his tree. But this morning I woke up and brrrr! It was like 60 degrees! I couldn’t find my comforter in my sleepy state, so I grabbed my sleeping bag and recuddled myself up for a bit.
